subsystem {
  name: "chat"
  module {
    name: "talker"
    zygote: "standard_zygote"
    dso: "${runfiles_dir}/__main__/testdata/talker.so"
  }
  module {
    name: "listener"
    zygote: "standard_zygote"
    dso: "${runfiles_dir}/__main__/testdata/listener.so"
  }

  dep: "subspace"
  dep: "standard_zygote"
}

interface: "chat"
